attributes.action: To ensure that the guide price in catalogue should reflect the minimum selling price and the highest bidder above that price should secure the property
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In line with fine art auctions the reserve cannot be above the lowest guide price, reflecting the FSA principles of Treating Customers Fairly (TFC)

Consider this, its your first auction, you see a property with a guide price of £180,000, you do your research, view the property, normally on a weekday when you should be at work, like what you see, take another ½ day off to take a friend, or a builder with you to just to make sure that it’s not going to fall down before you had a chance to sell it on. Take £19,500 out of your savings account and put it into a current account for the deposit, therefore loosing interest, organise a mortgage, take yet another day off work to attend the auction, only to find that your maximum bid of £195,000 is less than the reserve and the property remains unsold, how annoying is that!!!

The Guide price should reflect the minimum selling price and the highest bidder above that price should secure the property. Simple, open & honest.
